description.b: In this lesson you learn how to create new projects by using a wizard.

item.title: Open up the wizard
item.description: Start up the wizard in the main menu at File > New... > Application Diagram.... You can also use the following link.

item.title: Define model file name
item.description: Every project must store the elements being part of the software you create. Therefore you have to specify a file storing these elements. There are two files created: foo.mostapp for the actual application model and foo.mostdiagram for the diagram representation.
